= Class *jplex.components.frame.Modal*  _extends [APIPangolincomponentsFrame jplex.components.Frame]_  =

== Description ==
A preconfigured modal frame class

== Config Table ==
|| *Name* || *Default Value* || *Description* ||
|| _close_ || `jplex.components.Frame.CLOSE_CLICK_OUT` ||  Determine the way the user will close the modal frame ||
|| _header_ || `false` ||  Flag indicating whether the component has a title bar or not ||
|| _modal_ || `true` ||  Prevent the user to click outside and add an overlay to focus on the modal frame ||
|| _zBase_ || `9998` ||  z-index base for the frame and its overlay ||
